A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay...  Luke is Old\, and no Death Star!  If I had said this right away\, I could have saved half the viewers ten bucks.  To the remaining 50%\, Trust me\, this movie lived up to the Star Wars hype.  I would suspect the die-hard fans are bringing the reviews down because they want more of the exact same thing.  This movie is a satisfying part two to the NEW trilogy.  Just don't expect a full 70 year old cast lead this adventure.
